front.title: American National Standard Guide for Automated Electromagnetic Interference Measurements

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: U.S. consensus guideline for automation of conducted and radiated EMI compliance measurements is provided in this guide. This document does not include mandatory specifications for automation tools (i.e., application software, automated test equipment, computers and peripherals). Where possible, the guidance provided herein is harmonized with other national and international standards used for similar purposes.
